Author: pushups44
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Yes, they altered the terms from paying out from the total supply to tokens sold in the middle of the campaign, causing most bounty hunters to receive piddly amounts. A poster referred to bounty hunters as "leeches," which, judging by the silence, seems to be a sentiment shared by the Mark.Space team. This is not a sentiment shared by many successful projects that have cracked the top 200 in market cap and that have paid massive bounties, such as Ethlend and Crypterium.

Author: pushups44
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: I agree somewhat, but I think they have already damaged themselves. They have made it clear they won't budge, which is fine. While Mark.Space may pop up in price well above the ICO amount at some point, the management style of not communicating with the public is not in accord with the promises of transparency and openness brought by blockchain technology. If they are this tone deaf about the issue, I can only imagine future issues that may arise. In the long run, I think competitors that are more community-oriented will perform better. I think they damaged themselves long before the bounty issue arose, by selecting management that would be this indifferent to public relations.

Author: Pistacia
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: What? No.  Quote from: Slowhand26 on October 24, 2017, 12:20:46 PM We will distribute 0.5% of overall ICO pool  0.5% of overall ICO pool:   15,000,000 MRK.  PROOF Whitepaper page 35    What an utter provocation. Thinking that they could get away with this without significantly hurting their reputation is just unprofessional - and stupid.    Quote from: ssvenss on April 11, 2018, 04:59:00 PM Quote from: Pistacia on April 11, 2018, 11:10:04 AM WARNING  There is an ongoing scam accusation against the Mark.Space team  They are busted for trying to scam bounty participants by paying out less than 5% of the promised amount, and now they try to simply ignore this. Red negative trust imminent  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3286443.msg34279208#msg34279208  I'm fed up with this, I hate this attitude of the project team and the campaign manager to the participants, they think that the participants are a crowd that will do everything they say for pennies by changing the rules at the end or during the campaign, send them negative feedback!  Here are the factual numbers:  what the MARK.space guys promised in total, and what bounty participants worked for: 15,000,000 MRK  what the MARK.space guys say now: "total for distribution  686,068.5 MRK"   Only 4,57379% paid out.   95,42621% of the promised bounty payout is missing.  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3286443.msg34476942#msg34476942

Author: kerstman
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: As i was saying in the other post, they did update the bounty post. Not saying it's fair but...  TOTAL TOKENS SOLD: 145305220,5 MRK  0,5% * 145305220,5 MRK = 726526 MRK ALLOCATED FOR OUR BOUNTY CAMPAIGN  15mil tokens is 10% of what they sold in ICO wouldn't have been fair for the ones paying money for the tokens. Probably the mistake was putting a hard number on the %, assuming they sell all tokens. That didn't happens but they still gave 5% of what was sold.  15mil as stated in the whitepaper is not even 5% of the ICO Pool, it's from the total number of tokens if you actually make the calculation.

Author: TOM47
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Data Storage Trends 2018.  If one was to define the main trend in data storage for the year of 2018 and, most probably, for quite a few years to come, it would be this: the amount of data people, both individuals and enterprises, store and work with on a daily basis keeps growing exponentially. And it will continue to grow. This simple fact is the mother of all storage-related trends today and this will hardly change. It is going to be the driving force behind all the changes in data-storage market, specifically, in decentralized data storage market, but in fact, it is also the biggest change factor in the entire IT-industry, according to the Interop ITX and InformationWeek 2018 State of Infrastructure study.  It has been agreed with by many on many occasions, that decentralized storage offers much better options for customers with large data arrays in terms of flexibility, safety and anonymity, and this particular market is going through its boom stage, so let’s take a look at some of the interesting trends to look for during this year.  https://medium.com/@Market_space_/data-storage-trends-2018-bdb534a247f3

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Blockchain Powered 3D and VR Open Source Platform MARK.SPACE Announces the Launch of CRYPTO.VALLEY Virtual City  MARK.SPACE, a blockchain powered ecosystem for the creation of all types of VR/3D projects, has just launched their new virtual infrastructure project called CRYPTO.VALLEY. The creators claim that this new project will be a comprehensive and distinctive 3D and VR-compatible virtual city that will serve as an interactive hub of information for the crypto enthusiasts.  MARK.SPACE is delighted to announce the mega launch of CRYPTO.VALLEY, a new virtual infrastructure project that promises to be a cynosure of the global crypto community as an interactive and informational pool. In its fully functional form, CRYPTO.VALLEY will be a virtual city completely compatible with the 3D and VR technologies.  Read the details in the article of Coinidol dot com, the world blockchain news outlet: https://coinidol.com/mark-space-announces-launch-of-crypto-valley/

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: MARK.SPACE has an internal currency - the MARK token (MRK), which is a utility token (not a paper bond) allowing all users to sell and buy VR spaces and objects, consume various goods and use services, pay salaries to their employees and to buy ads to promote their businesses through the MARK.SPACE platform. GPU-miners who will be rendering VR spaces and objects for the platform’s users will also receive rewards in MRK tokens (Proof of Work (PoW) Concept).

Author: miraxgr
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Just one last question about main idea of the project, it is interesting for me reed what people are thinking about their projects)

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: The main idea of MARK.SPACE is to give the world an easy tool to create and launch any VR/3D project, and to do it quickly, without significant costs. Secondly, all projects created on our platform will be accessible from most ordinary devices, such as a PCs, laptops, tablets or smartphones - through any web-browser and without the need to use a VR-headset. The project was conceived with the idea of leveraging the VR technologies that had just appeared, to create a world where everything would resemble real life as closely as possible.

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: MARK.SPACE is an open-source platform for the creation of 3D/VR spaces and objects of any purpose, as well as their quick launch and integration into a unique ecosystem. The platform is maintained by a crypto economy and is powered by Blockchain. MARK.SPACE supports all Internet browsers (preferably Chrome) and, at the same time, is compatible with CardBoard, Oculus and HTC Vive. A desktop PC or notebook is all that is needed to create a state-of-the-art VR store, office, community or other space for business or entertainment.

Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: The MARK.SPACE universe consists of multiple VR spaces (units), in which each unit can be linked directly to its own top-level domain. The property right to the units is guaranteed by recording all transactions involving units (creation, sale, purchase or rental) on the Blockchain. All unit owners may buy, sell or rent their units to others using smart contracts.

Author: saintkamei
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Bounty tokens usually affect the price of the token short-term, only because of their habit to cash out early in droves. However, if you are investing long-term on a solid project like this, why would you worry about the bounty payout or bonus tokens. Bounty program is a marketing tool that brings in more money to a project than it gives out. The bonus tokens, in a way, is a slow appreciation of the token price because the payout is greater at the first time and then lesser as we go. I wouldn't worry about this as an investor.

Author: CHRISBIN702
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: The bounty dumpers are just part of the game my friend. If you were really concerned about value crashes at the beginning of a tokens life on the market, I'd worry more about pre-sale whales than I would some bounty dumps. These whales sometimes strategically come into pre-sales with large bonuses and buy up as many as they can just to sell immediately at a price that is basically guaranteed a profit. Even if they sell at or below ICO prices.

Author: andreibi
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Precisely... In fact bounty dumpers are only able to affect the market if and when the token is listed in a small volume exchange. And then when it reaches the bottom, you'll notice the large buyers are just nibbling on the small dumps. Pre-sale buyers won't dump on small exchanges, they wait for the real markets.

Author: wiserico
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: MARK.SPACE has been added to WISERICO tracker    Vote for the  MARK.SPACE  on WISERICO and follow MARK.SPACE on the  media platforms:  Telegram Twitter Facebook Medium   MARK.SPACE is a platform for fast creating of 3D / VR — compatible spaces (web sites) and objects for any purpose (such as stores for selling real goods, company offices, communities, services, games, blogs, galleries, etc.), as well as for their rapid placement in the Internet and integration into a single ecosystem. The platform has its own crypto-economy, powered by blockchain technology (MRK token). The platform allows users to create their own 3D spaces / units (in fact unit is 3D web-site) very quickly and cheaply in order to conduct business (trade and services), engage in non-commercial activities, educating and launching of entertainment and game projects and much more (no restrictions). The MARK.SPACE universe consists of a great amount of 3D/VR spaces (units). The minimal size of the virtual space in the system is a unit (a minimum of 64 square meters). Each unit can be linked directly to it’s own top-level domain. Spaces may consist of 1 or 36 units. The unit’s property registry is maintained on blockchain, operations with units (sale, purchase, renting) are provided by smart contracts.  WISERICO on BITCOINTALK

Body: I think a lot of people feel that way since everybody was already expecting mass adoption of VR by now. But i think the main reason there has been little adoption is because first generation hardware for it is expensive as fuck. Second is that there is still very little content for it.  But i have no doubt that this market will boom within a year. You see all the big players like Facebook investing heavily into it, they will not make it fail, i can guarantee. Anybody who has tried proper VR experiences, not some Google cardboard, knows this is the future.  That is why i am bullish on the Mark.Space project. They combine two sectors who are growing enormously, blockchain and VR. My one wish is that there will also be a focus on AR, since i believe this will also offer a lot of opportunities.

Body: Sure, it's not guaranteed that your investment will pay off immediately when you invest in an ICO but why do you think Mark.Space is a 'stupid' project? The fact that it has only a whitepaper is just not true. They already have demo.  And when you expect a fully working product to invest in, you are probably at the wrong place at 99% of the ICOs. These projects need to raise money to develop their ideas. Some might fail but for all the projects that can deliver what their whitepapers promised, you'll be upset for not investing early.

It is best to invest in what you think is working or might work; in what you like or are interested in. Indeed, you can have the good fortune money just by investing blindly in a project without knowing it, based only on ratings. but not always ratings are real. Author: saintkamei
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: I don't who know did the analysis here but it differs slightly with ICO bench a week ago. One of the experts listed these points:   - Does not clearly define the problem they're solving. Is it that people don't have time? Is it online 3D retail made available? What's the point of having 3D residence and converse with people there if I can use SKYPE? - Explanatory video hardly explains anything. - 3D retail not gonna work for all industries. Especially upper class clothing and luxury brands: people have an experience shopping, try things out before buying, sometimes it is a status thing. 3VR at current stage of development and accesibility is not going to change that yet. - Team has no advisors. - Team member links to FB pages and/or wikipedia for the ICE hockey guy. Should it be an inspiration of confidence? How does ICE hockey skills relate to VR and this project?   My question is, has any of this changed for MarkSpace to score a 4.1 now? I am not trying to be the bogeyman but since we are all invested in this exciting project, we ought to know.

Author: cantdecide
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: I think the comparison with SKYPE is quite weak ... beside the fact that SKYPE is not 3D/VR you could have argued in the same way that who would have needed SKYPE at skypes beginning. Especially as there were not even so many fast internet connections. I think there will always be people who would prefere a new technology especially if it brings a different view to the things, in this case a VR view.  About the advisors: I am sometimes be happy if a project don't have 12-100 advisors. Beside of the fact that these guys get a good share of the money (project tokens/coins) a lot of them have different views and then the fun beginns and you see postponed ICOs, changing rules and project focusses every 2 weeks etc. pp. How is it called: Too many cooks spoil the broth.

Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain

Author: lordmick
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: One of the downsides of having this kind of project on the blockchain is that transactions have to undergo a cumbersome ritual that doesn't scale. In other words, the decentralized computer isn't fast enough to deal with the apps running on it. As we can see from CryptoKitties. It's a trade off between performance and security (or is it trust?) and for some apps it doesn't make sense to run in the blockchain. Now if you were buying a Landrover thru Mark.space, sure, it's safer than sending a cheque by mail. But unfortunately you're sharing the decentralized computer with frivolous apps, so your payment fails or is delayed. Body: MARK.SPACE will allow distributing goods produced in the real world, and any content created within the framework of the platform. This will allow selling custom furniture items and decor created by users, as well as entire personal or business spaces that were purchased earlier. Freelancers will be able to create their own virtual offices for advertising and selling their services. Opportunity for all users to advertise in common areas (for example, sidewalks or roads) between buildings and interiors of the shopping center will be available.

Author: H. Veron
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: The MARK.SPACE platform is a virtual ecosystem, built on the principle of the existing world and the blockchain technology. This is another reality, which is available in any browser. This platform is compatible with all available virtual reality tools. Speaking technically, MARC.SPACE is the latest generation of sites that are independent, since they have their own domain, but they have a common unified transaction system for blockchain. Each person can optionally visit the virtual reality space and augmented reality in the MARC.SPACE universe

Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: The defining feature of MarkSpace I think is the high res rendered VR using 3D scanned objects that runs on everything better than a potato, but it also has some drawbacks as far as I know. If it's prerendered you can't have a lot of interactivity. For that you'd have to move to real time VR, which has many drawbacks like having to use powerful computers and high development costs for modeling and animating. It's a trade off but there's room for both.

Body: What is MOSL? Is it a special language? What for do you need it?

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: MOSL is a language similar to JavaScript for creating objects within MARK.SPACE, allowing the implementation of: •   Visual presentation of an object in 3D; •   Movement of an object in 3D; •   Visual effects of an object; •   Showing content when interacting with an object; •   Content control function when interacting with an object; •   Custom functionality of an object.

Author: 23coins
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Guys, tell me please about the system of identification? How it is realized in your project? And tell me some details about your current identification system?

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: •   User open key - users to get open information about the user; •   User private key - private for each user, stored in browser local storage and used for runtime user identification by the front-end; •   User fingertip - hidden system key used by the back-end and internode communication.

Author: 23coins
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Is it possible to be anonymous? Or I should follow the hole identification process?

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Users may choose to provide full identification or remain anonymous. Those willing to make sure that their ownership of a particular virtual real estate is tied to their ID should be providing full identification. In addition to the existing ID system, we are planning to use Keybase and other identity systems later, once they become available.

Author: elrugrim
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: At present, we are developing our own scripting language that is going to make it possible for users to create their own 3D objects and applications. Alternatively, you can already easily virtualize the interior of any existing premises by using a 360° camera and importing it to MARK.SPACE.

Author: 23coins
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: How are the goods and services are distributed? Also I want to understand the consumption level.

Author: elrugrim
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: The MARK.SPACE Shopping area will allow both the distribution of goods produced in the real world and any content created within the platform. This will include the ability to sell custom elements of furniture and decor created by users (our platform already facilitates this) as well as carry out operations with entire personal or business spaces acquired by users previously. Freelancers will be able to create their own virtual offices for advertising and selling their services. The ability for all users to advertise in common areas (like sidewalks or roads) between buildings and mall interiors will also be implemented.

Author: 23coins
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: I have one more question about cities and squire miters that cities consists of?

Author: elrugrim
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: The MARK.SPACE Platform consists of cities that, according to certain rules, a community, company or person can create on their own. The first city on the platform will be launched according to the Roadmap. The number of cities in the system is unlimited. A city is a virtual space with a maximum estimated area of 713,440,000 m2, which is divided into districts, blocks and units

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: At present, each user has access to the following personal information: •   Profile •   Settings •   Friends list •   Messages log •   Personal photo gallery •   Personal content (files, documents and links to the content sent from other systems) •   Personal blog •   Personal apartment with assigned address that allows visits even from the unregistered users •   Personal belongings, furniture and the elements of decor located in the apartment •   Personal fitting room for storing clothes and trying them on •   Gifts from other users

Author: miraxgr
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: What is HUB? Explain me please the meaning of this term. What does this abbreviation means?

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: HUB - storing references to data blocks; addresses of DATA SERVERs and SERVICEs; accepting requests from servers and clients (UI); locating servers for executing tasks and returning data about these servers and access keys

Author: miraxgr
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Participants understand and accept that the they can send an amount of ETH or BTC equal to not less than 10.00 (ten) USD according to the cost of ETH to the date of the beginning of the MRK Token Sale into a smart contract system on Ethereum and receive an amount of MRK Tokens in exchange. The maximum contribution amount is 10,000 (ten thousand) ETH. Please remember that all transaction amounts at all times fluctuate based on the applicable exchange rate of either ETH or BTC.

Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain

Author: Vansire
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: VR hardware benefits from improvements in mobile tech because VR displays are the same kind of displays as smartphone displays. The biggest hurdle is getting the pixels small enough so you don't get distracted by them when the display is right on your nose. The smaller the pixels the more you need of them. And the more pixels the higher the processing power you need to draw those pixels.  There's going to be a point where the displays are sharp enough for smart phones. Then it's going to depend on the demand for super hi res VR headsets whether the tech progresses further or stalls.

By selling tickets to these events, the elected representatives of the community will be able to cover the costs associated with the life of the community. Is there anything that prevents MarkSpace from being rendered in realtime and then streamed to mobile (VR) devices? How much more power do you need to render MarkSpace compared to a 3D VR game on a console or PC?

Author: Seidr
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: MARK.SPACE supports all internet browsers (preferably Chrome) and, at the same time, is compatible with CardBoard, Oculus and HTC Vive. A desktop PC is all that's needed to create a state-of-the-art VR store, office, community or other space for either business or entertainment.

Author: Seidr
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: The main idea of MARK.SPACE is to give the world an easy tool to create and launch any VR / 3D project, and to do it quickly, without noticeable costs. Secondly, all projects made on our platform will be accessible from most ordinary devices, such as a PCs, laptops, tablets, or smartphones-through any web-browser and without the need to use a VR-headset. The project was conceived with the idea of leverage VR technologies that just appeared, in order to create a world where everything would resemble real life as close as possible.

Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: The goal is to provide the maximum possible number of economic interactions. Advertising will be one of the most significant sources of income for communities. Author: lider1971
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: The main idea of MARK.SPACE is to give the world an easy tool to create and launch any VR / 3D project, and to do it quickly, without noticeable costs. Secondly, all projects made on our platform will be accessible from most ordinary devices, such as a PCs, laptops, tablets, or smartphones-through any web-browser and without the need to use a VR-headset. The project was conceived with the idea of leverage VR technologies that just appeared, in order to create a world where everything would resemble real life as close as possible.

Author: CravenEconomics
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Good evening) Thanks for your question) The ultimate goal is to achieve full decentralization for the benefit of both users and those selling computational and storage resources to enable platform functionality.

Author: NeedsMoreJPEG
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: And what information can I have the access?

Author: CravenEconomics
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: At present, each user has access to the following personal information: Profile Settings Friends list Messages log Personal photo gallery Personal content (files, documents and links to content sent from other systems) Personal blog Personal apartment with dedicated address that can be visited even from users not registered in the system Personal belongings, furniture and elements of decor located in apartment

Author: NeedsMoreJPEG
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain

Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain

Author: retrend
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Tell me please, what is the difference between your project and other?

Author: kolinko
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: As opposed to other projects, the future MARK.SPACE architecture is not just a solution relying on Ethereum Virtual Machine for smart contracts, implementing core functionality; it's a powerful development platform with its own virtual machine and its own internal blockchain, allowing the development of complex applications in its own scripting language (similar to Java). The use of Ethereum smart contracts is limited only to the critical functionality and utilizes the Ethereum blockchain.

Author: retrend
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Very interesting! And tell me more about the token!

Author: kolinko
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: MRK is a ERC20 standard token that will be issued on the Ethereum blockchain. MRK tokens will be used for all transactions across all MARK spaces. There is an internal debate on whether to offer an ability to buy goods in the malls located in the Mark Shopping District for other crypto or even fiat currencies. We may decide to implement it at some point.

In addition, any user can visit the 3D / VR / AR (virtual reality / augmented reality) spaces inside the universe MARK.SPACE for free.

All MARK.SPACE locations are 3D zones fully operating in any browser and compatible with all VR headsets. This solution increases the audience of users and content providers tenfolds. Using VR glasses or helmets is optional, which opens up absolutely unique opportunities development of the Internet economy sectors.

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: The goal is to provide the maximum possible number of economic interactions. Advertising will be one of the most significant sources of income for communities. Different communities created on the MARK platform will have the opportunity to organize events. Members of the community will be able to participate in such events using their avatars. By selling tickets to these events, the elected representatives of the community will be able to cover the costs associated with the life of the community. The community can open its store in the MARK shopping area and sell various products or provide services

Author: Vansire
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: If you've ever worn different pairs of shoes, I bet that's the case for most of you, you know the size on the label is always different from the size of the shoes themselves. The shoe industry just can't agree on what an inch or cm is.  What I'm getting at is, sure you can hire an Italian tailor to professionally measure your body, but if the size on the labels is wrong it's pointless. Whoever offers these virtual clothing service has to hire tailors to measure the clothing precisely.

Author: belechau
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain

Certainly the Mark.Space platform and any other that uses VR can apply such techniques

Author: Yasemin
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Article quote from october 2017  Quote ''Oculus is announcing a new standalone VR headset that will sit in the middle of its lineup between the mobile Gear VR and high-end Oculus Rift, called Oculus Go. Oculus Go will ship early next year for $199, not too much more than the $129 Gear VR and significantly less than the $499 Rift. It’s supposed to enable everyday uses of VR without the trouble of plugging in a phone or computer, at an affordable price point. Mark Zuckerberg announced the news at this year’s Oculus Connect conference, saying it’s a way to reach his next goal for Oculus: getting one billion people in VR.''  https://www.theverge.com/2017/10/11/16459442/oculus-go-standalone-vr-headset-announce-pricing   If Mark Zuckerberg wants to get 1 billion people in VR, this is good news for all the VR ICOs including MarkSpace

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Not at all. We are happy to help you any moment.

Author: erik777
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Hello! I want to ask you about e-commerce.

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: There are 1.5 bln Internet buyers holding a total market share of over 2.6 trln USD. One can buy practically anything and use the services offered on the Internet. MARK.SPACE platform brings e-commerce to a whole new level, not only in terms of visual capabilities. 3D / VR stores look much better than their real equivalents.

Author: erik777
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: You know, I’m keen on it. I’m interested in commercial projects. Describe me a bit.

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: The demand for the virtualization of commercial projects is too difficult to implement at the moment. In terms of costs and the creation of virtual stores, merging such projects is out of the question. One of the solutions may be that we have built a platform that allows anyone to create and design commercial VR-spaces without the need to know even the basics of coding and 3D modeling.

Author: erik777
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Ok. It is very important for me, so tell me a bit also about tokens.

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Well. The MRK token is an internal currency (Utility token). All users can use them for selling real and virtual goods and services, hiring employees and paying for their work, creating units ( and filling them with objects and content for their individualization). Miners will be paid in tokens for platform support. The unit price is fixed in tokens with a limited number of units. The unit value will always be growing, Each unit can have popular and powerful neighbors (for example, a well-known brand). All these factors are indisputable drivers of the growth of the token price.

Author: erik777
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Oh, thank you very much dears. I’m so satisfied with the answers.

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: It is a pleasure to hear it. May we can help you more. Do you have other questions?

Author: erik777
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Wow, thank you very much for your care but not yet

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Ok, anyway we are ready to prompt if there are questions.

Author: erik777
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Dears, what is the aim of your project, I want to know everything about your project.

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: This is the platform for business, e-commerce, and communities where anybody can create their own 3D website that is compatible with VR.

Author: erik777
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: I want to know the technical side of your project.

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: MARK.SPACE is an alternative reality, available in any browser, without pre-installation and registration. This platform is compatible with any VR-headset - entire world comprising shops, offices, banks, cinemas, clubs, communities of interest and personal spaces.

Author: erik777
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Ok. But tell me more, it is very interesting pert for me.

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Technically, MARK.SPACE is a new generation of the Internet: compatible websites that, on the one hand are independent (since they have their own domain) and on the other are united by a common transaction and accounting system on the Blockchain and a global search engine. In addition, any user can visit the 3D / VR / AR (virtual reality / augmented reality) spaces inside the universe MARK.SPACE for free.

Author: erik777
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: It is very good. And I can meet frequently VR or AR, explain me please.

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: The AR / VR market share will grow from USD 11.4 bln in 2017 to USD 215 bln in 2021. VR is much more than gaming; it’s also e-commerce, business, education, science, film industry and many other areas. All MARK.SPACE locations are 3D zones fully operating in any browser and compatible with all VR headsets. This solution increases the audience of users and content providers tenfolds. Using VR glasses or helmets is optional, which opens up absolutely unique opportunities development of the Internet economy sectors.

Author: 23coins

Author: elrugrim
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: The MRK token enables all users to sell and buy VR units and objects, consume various goods and use services, pay salary to their employees and buy ads to promote their businesses through the platform.

Author: 23coins
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain

Author: elrugrim

Author: miraxgr
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: What is goal of your project? What is the idea?

Author: elrugrim
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: The main idea of MARK.SPACE is to give the world an easy tool to create and launch any VR/3D project, and to do it quickly, without noticeable costs.

Author: miraxgr
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Cool) That’s all?

Author: elrugrim
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Secondly, all projects made on our platform will be accessible from most ordinary devices, such as a PCs, laptops, tablets, or smartphones - through any web-browser and without the need to use a VR-headset. The project was conceived with the idea to leverage VR technologies that just appeared, in order to create a world where everything would resemble real life as close as possible.

Author: miraxgr
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Wonderful) And how long do you work with it ?

Author: sasha55
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: In top!

Author: elrugrim
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: We invested 2,5 years and $5 millions of personal funds into VR technology research, the making of prototypes and getting feedback from businesses.

Author: miraxgr
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Tell me please what districts you are going to have? And also tell me please their sizes.

Author: elrugrim
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: To start off, there will be just four districts: Residential, Business, Community and Shopping, but we may add more in the future. Adding new potential districts and buildings will be carefully controlled to make sure it won’t affect market value of existing real estates. Each MARK district will consist of 1296 neighborhoods, whereas each neighborhood will be made up of 36 buildings.

The Bancor Protocol™  An upgraded functionality standard for Ethereum tokens which allows smart contracts to be their own market makers. These Smart Tokens™ hold "Connector" tokens which plug them into a decentralized liquidity network.

Author: justboris
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Here are some of our main advantages:  -   High-level readiness, even before the ICO (check our demo to experience it yourself); -   Cross-platform use: our product runs on practically any platform; any type of smartphone, tablet, desktop PC, and even on Smart-TV. -   User-friendliness: no knowledge of programming language required to use the platform and to create your own virtual spaces; -   This project is developed in-house and funded by its founders;

Author: justboris
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Once again, here are some of our main advantages:  -   High-level readiness, even before the ICO (check our demo to experience it yourself); -   Cross-platform use: our product runs on practically any platform; any type of smartphone, tablet, desktop PC, and even on Smart-TV. -   User-friendliness: no knowledge of programming language required to use the platform and to create your own virtual spaces; -   This project is developed in-house and funded by its founders;

Author: justboris
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain

Author: justboris
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain

Author: justboris
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain

Author: KryptoTark
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Thanks for the answers, nice to see you so active here. I assume you are part of the dev team?  What is the purpouse of the residential VR unit? And are the unitspaces on your platform limited?  Quote from: justboris on December 17, 2017, 11:40:40 PM Quote from: magisterr on December 16, 2017, 10:09:40 PM Quote Did you know that MARK.SPACE has a separate miner fund? An impressive token allocation goes to miners for their support of the platform, their rendering and storage capacity. You know what’s really cool? Any participant can become a miner in our system — so can you! Be sure to check out all benefits!  We can mining Mark Space? But this is ERC20 tokens.. so.. how?    We are in the process of developing our own blockchain, which will be used for distributed data storage and rendering of VR spaces.  That is very good news too, its definitely more secure to have your own blockchain, than relying on the etherium network, that get constantly more and more transactions on it, as new companies are built on it.

Author: elrugrim
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: MARK.SPACE is an open source platform for creation of 3D/VR spaces and objects of any purpose, as well as their quick launch and integration into a unique ecosystem. The platform is maintained by a crypto economy and is powered by the Blockchain.

Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain

Author: elrugrim
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: MARK.SPACE supports all internet browsers (preferably Chrome) and, at the same time, is compatible with CardBoard, Oculus and HTC Vive. A desktop PC is all that’s needed to create a state-of-the-art VR store, office, community or other space for either business or entertainment.

Author: scambust
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: So, I signed up at the Mark.Space ICO site, intending to invest in the MRK tokens. I noticed that there's an account address. I assumed this is where you'll send the tokens after ICO.  But I don't see any option to withdraw the tokens from the site?!?! Also I don't see any private keys or 12 word phrases given? (already a standard practice on other ICO sites) How will I be able to get my tokens if I have no access to the account address?  Have you edited your FAQs? https://docs.google.com/document/d/1kfKsRaR5Bj3FsS9JuyXD2T28v_3ixnRD9GfdAPjP1ZI/edit  This confuses me:    Where is the link?  Q: Where can I read your Whitepaper? A:  Our Whitepaper is available via this link: c  No instructions for this:  Q: Can I participate without creating a new wallet? A: You can! Our tokens have the ERC20 standard, so you can use your existing ETH wallet to which we will transfer the tokens.  Etherium? Is that a different network?  Q: On which platform is the token released? A: The MRK token is released on the ETH platform (etherium)   I hope you can answer my questions cuz this is starting to stink and feel scammy.

Author: elrugrim
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: The main idea of MARK.SPACE is to give the world an easy tool to create and launch any VR / 3D project, and to do it quickly, without noticeable costs. Secondly, all projects made on our platform will be accessible from most ordinary devices, such as a PCs, laptops, tablets, or smartphones-through any web-browser and without the need to use a VR-headset. The project was conceived with the idea of leverage VR technologies that just appeared, in order to create a world where everything would resemble real life as close as possible.

Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: At present, each user has access to the following personal information: Profile Settings Friends list Messages log Personal photo gallery Personal content (files, documents and links to content sent from other systems) Personal blog Personal apartment with dedicated address that can be visited even from users not registered in the system Personal belongings, furniture and elements of decor located in apartment

Author: erik777
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Tell us please, what is the difference between your project and other?

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: As opposed to other projects, the future MARK.SPACE architecture is not just a solution relying on Ethereum Virtual Machine for smart contracts, implementing core functionality; it's a powerful development platform with its own virtual machine and its own internal blockchain, allowing the development of complex applications in its own scripting language (similar to Java). The use of Ethereum smart contracts is limited only to the critical functionality and utilizes the Ethereum blockchain.

Author: erik777
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Very interesting! And tell me more about the token!

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: MRK is a ERC20 standard token that will be issued on the Ethereum blockchain. MRK tokens will be used for all transactions across all MARK spaces. There is an internal debate on whether to offer an ability to buy goods in the malls located in the Mark Shopping District for other crypto or even fiat currencies. We may decide to implement it at some point.

Author: Vansire
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Don't think so.  For starters, mixer reality is different from VR. In VR you only see the virtual world, because the screen isn't transparent. You could attach a camera to see the outside real world behind the virtual world, but that's called augmented reality. It's not better or worse, it's just different like a fantasy movie and a documentary are. Mixed reality goes one step further than augmented reality because the virtual world is interacting with the real world, but it's still not better or worse than VR. How do they call that, I think suspension of disbelief, it's better with VR. With AR and MR you're always aware you're in the real world.  The Hololens isn't that impressive tbh. The hardware is lagging behind the demos Microsoft is showing, as if you can see the MR all around you, but it's a tiny screen.

Bitcoin, even in it's growth right now is still not immune to the possibility that it will go down. Which it might. It is still an experiment after all. We might get a million or a zero. It is the same with emerging  and speculative markets. They're called speculative for a reason. So this project, could either be a success or a flop. Who knows. But as long as the team is strong and they have a clear vision of what they want, I can see success. Which I think the MARK.SPACE team has. Personally, I want this project to be a success. Author: Vansire
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: One of the downsides of having this kind of project on the blockchain is that transactions have to undergo a cumbersome ritual that doesn't scale. In other words, the decentralized computer isn't fast enough to deal with the apps running on it. As we can see from CryptoKitties. It's a trade off between performance and security (or is it trust?) and for some apps it doesn't make sense to run in the blockchain. Now if you were buying a Landrover thru Mark.space, sure, it's safer than sending a cheque by mail. But unfortunately you're sharing the decentralized computer with frivolous apps, so your payment fails or is delayed. Ethereum better solve this scalability problem soon because it's hurting business.

Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: 1) 4 * 36 * 36 * 36 = 186624 unit. Each of them is 8 x 8 = 64 m2. Is it correct? Yes 2) To get free Residential, how many tokens do I need to buy? If you register now (during presale period) you will get one Residential unit for free! 3) Why will bounty rewards be frozen for as long as 1.5 months? That is easy - to avoid token price drop right after the listing at the exchanges. We already have a few preliminary agreements with exchanges and we are trying to avoid price dropping (in my personal opinion this period should be even longer - then baunty hunters will get the value of MRK and not sell right after freezen period. Disclaimer: that is my personal opinion)

Author: ePesoInitiative
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: I'm sorry, I don't have Telegram installed.  Yes I understand that the MRX wallet is made from the email address and password created during the sign-up progress and then encrypted with the same site password.  Yes, everytime you click for the backup wallet, you get a backup in which you have to decrypt with your password made during the signup. And then you're supposed to see your ETH address with its private keys. It is supposed to be the same ETH address indicated in the dashboard.  I did not make any password recovery or reset and the backup's eth address and the one on the dashboard does not match.  I don't understand this statement: "he can not access the address of the wallet, because he is encrypted." Clearly once decrypted, you're supposed to see the same ETH address shown in the dashboard, but it's not.

Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Not exactly, let me clarify:  First stage is token pre-sale & sale. Then you may use tokens to buy space (actually units of space). You may buy our units using our tokens only.  However, we decided to give certain exception for early birds! People, who are participating in pre-sale will get units as bonus So, that is quite cool reward as they will be able to sell/rent or further develop their bonus units It is not even announced yet - I will keep you posted  Best regards, Boris Baranov, MARK.SPACE Community Manager, WP link: https://markspace.io/files/MARKSPACE_WhitePaper.pdf Follow us on: Telegram: https://telegram.me/markspaceio LinkedIN: https://www.linkedin.com/company/18282815/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/markspace.io Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsCnOl-aDTMgmmPBWSvFonQ/videos

Author: mark.space
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Hello ! The nearest servers carry out interrogations of each other for comparison checksums of the main kernel files. If discrepancies are identified, a re-test is performed and, possibly, the server is disconnected from the entire system (revocation of a license) based on the fact of interference in a single kernel code. The owner will receive a warning and a requirement to check the server and restore kernel code. After that, the registration procedure will be resumed and will continue to work in project.

Author: mark.space
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: As opposed to other projects, the future MARK.SPACE architecture is not just a solution relying on Ethereum Virtual Machine for smart contracts, implementing core functionality; it’s a powerful development platform with its own virtual machine and its own internal blockchain, allowing development of complex applications in its own scripting language (similar to Java).  The use of Ethereum smart contracts is limited only to critical functionality and utilizes the Ethereum blockchain.  Additionally, the platform has a fully decentralized architecture in contrast to other projects that just call it decentralized. Decentralization is achieved through the use of three types of servers. These servers will be picked from available machines of network participants providing their computational and storage resources and assigned one of three roles: DATA SERVER - data blocks storage; receiving, storing and retrieving data. SERVICE - accepting and executing tasks and returning results. HUB - storing references to data blocks; addresses of DATA SERVERs and SERVICEs; accepting requests from servers and clients (UI); locating servers for executing tasks and returning data about these servers and access keys.

Author: mark.space
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Hello ! Thank you for your question !  Currently, there are many projects that attempt to combine VR and Blockchain technologies but MARK.SPACE takes the synergy of the ideas to a whole new level.By combining the best of both and supporting the VR-platform with a crypto-economy, MARK.SPACE created a technologically advanced virtual universe, allowing for decentralized transactions and 100% transparency.  Before MARK.SPACE, creating personalized VR projects was time consuming and expensive, and only possible with the assistance of professional developers. In the framework of the MARK.SPACE universe, each person or organization is able start their own VR/3D project, without knowing even the basics of programming.  Specially designed gadgets and costly equipment like Oculus, HTC Vive, VR-helmets and the like are optional, with no need to use powerful computers or to download special Apps. The only thing required from users is one of their existing gadgets – PCs, tablets or smartphones, and an internet connection.  Moreover, all MARK.SPACE areas will have their own web address, which means users may connect them to a domain of their choice – people will be able to visit spaces directly, without even knowing they just entered a part of an entire VR-universe.  To add to the list of how different and technologically advanced MARK.SPACE is compared to other VR-projects, we have to mention the technological readiness of the platform even before the start of the ICO, which can already be experienced by visiting the demo.

Author: mark.space
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Hello Today, many companies market their services online. Sometimes these companies don’t even have physical offices. VR technology allows any reputable company to virtualize their office and allow it to be visited by potential customers. If you are looking for a lawyer or trying to choose a movie production studio, thinking about hiring an IT outsourcing firm or considering visiting a plastic surgery clinic -  having an opportunity to first visit its virtual premises would only help in making a correct decision. Imagine each company that recently managed a successful ICO having its own virtual office that any investor could visit. As you walk down the hall you see offices of Lisk, AEthernity, Tezos, Civic, Waves, EOS, and the like. ICO promotional agencies could purchase an office right next to the Ethereum foundation. Copywriters could purchase an office right next door. With the MARK platform it’s going to simply take a 360° camera and few hours of work to make it possible. Any freelancer or artist could create their own office.

Author: mark.space
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: The Residential District allows any user to do one of two things: digitize their real apartment/condo/house using a 360° camera (in the not so distant future it will be possible to do so with a regular smartphone) or create a dream residence using various designs and furniture items currently available in the system. It will also be possible to upload your own designs and objects. Once it’s done, you could post the link with its unique address to either one of the existing social networks.

Author: justboris
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Well, first of all if someone is buying entire building - then in my humble opinion this person is not so ordinary already (diclaimer: that is my personal opinion) Second, there are plenty of options what you can do with the building, and that depends on what kind of building you are buying. So far we have residential, shopping (commercial), business (offices), and community buildings in respective districts. So, if you are buying residential building - you may create certain design for its exterior and for interior  and then sell or rent it to other users. Also, you will be able to put ad banners on facade of the building and get some revenue from that and so on. The same applies to shopping building - you may sell or rent space in it to shops, you may ope  yourown shops(s), you may put various ads on the building etc. Possibilities are endless Regarding business building - you may sell/rent space there for all types of companies who would like to have 3d/VR representation. You may get additional profit from 3d/VR/AR cinference services Last but not least: community buildings: you may open yourown gallery or invite existing artist to open his gallery. Also, you may like to invite existing museums to join and create their VR-museums. You may create all types of communities - such any type of activity fans community: like indie rock community, outdoor sports community,  etc etc

Author: justboris
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: That is very good question, Itogo.  Could you please specify what do you mean by "filing the proper paperwork"? To the best of my knowledge the process is not fully formalized yet, and were are considering various steps to insure compliance with SEC regulation. (Actually, as MRK is utility token and NOT securities - we do pass Howey Test, and we just need prove it - we are working with legal community on that subject. You may find detailed description of legal framework here: https://www.coinbase.com/legal/securities-law-framework.pdf) Bottom line: we do hope to be able to invite US citizens to participate in our ICO if and only if we are absolutely sure that we are in full compliance with SEC and other regulators.   Best regards, Boris Baranov, MARK.SPACE Community Manager, WP link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bwy2gU8FcdEEODR2cERxOWNvbEU/view Follow us on: Telegram: https://telegram.me/markspaceio LinkedIN: https://www.linkedin.com/company/18282815/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/markspace.io Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsCnOl-aDTMgmmPBWSvFonQ/videos

Best regards, Boris Baranov, MARK.SPACE Community Manager, WP link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bwy2gU8FcdEEODR2cERxOWNvbEU/view Follow us on: Telegram: https://telegram.me/markspaceio LinkedIN: https://www.linkedin.com/company/18282815/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/markspace.io Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsCnOl-aDTMgmmPBWSvFonQ/videos

Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Here is interesting update regarding SEC: https://www.txsrb.org/single-post/2017/10/21/There-is-NO-gray-area-with-coins-Everything-is-already-covered-by-the-SEC-and-CFTC  As for China - unfortunately for the whole crypto community latest gathering of the communist party decided to continue the ban to any ICO, so we do not consider China will fully investigate and approve our case. We will be happy to submit it to China's officials if/when they will change the policy

Author: mark.space
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: To start off, there will be just four districts: Residential, Business,Community and Shopping, but we may add more in the future. Adding new potential districts and buildings will be carefully controlled to make sure it won’t affect the market value of existing real estates. Each MARK district will consist of 1296 neighbourhoods, whereas each neighbourhood will be made up of 36 buildings. Each building will have 36 floors and, in turn, each floor will contain 36 groups of units.

Author: justboris
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Well, we wish Decentraland team all the best. They did not perform poorly in terms of ICO, by the way. They raised $24M in half an hour time.  However, our project is very much different from theirs. Here is a list of key differences:   First of all, they were going to ICO just with a concept, and we have working prototype: http://demo.mark.space Second, MARK.SPACE is very user-friendly: no need for special skills to build your residence or shop there Third, we already have some preliminary agreements with buyers/renters of virtual real estate in Shopping/Business districts  justBoris, MARK.SPACE Community Manager

Author: mark.space
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: MARK.SPACE PROGRESS REPORT FOR MARCH 2018 — SEPTEMBER 2018 This information is publicly available and is not a legal document   MARCH DEVELOPERS:  Development of a decentralized secure data storage architecture. Identification of options for storage formats and inter-server interactions. Creation of a preliminary version of the platform with user accounts and the implementation the basics of crypto economy in several formats. Stress-testing with the definition of the final acceptable format. Launch of the selected format. Development of an interface for accessing personal data of users from various websites (both owned and not owned by the platform), called MARK.SPACE PASS. The beginning of the procedure for user registration (allocation of accounts in MARK.SPACE PASS).  3D DESIGN/ VISUALIZATION:  Experimental modeling of scenes of premises for future unit boxes.  BEGINNING OF APRIL DEVELOPERS: https://mark.space/wallet  Implementation of Blockchain technology on the basis of the Ethereum platform. Organization of token transfer between ERC-20 standard wallets. Definition of formats for storing private keys of user wallets in the ERC-20 standard. Stress testing with the definition of the final storage format of ERC-20 wallets. Registration of wallets; unique for each MARK.SPACE user. Organization of MRK-token and ETH transfer between any ERC-20 standards wallets and user’s personal wallets within the platform. Launch of the crypto economy of the MARK.SPACE platform. The beginning of sales unit vouchers.  3D DESIGN/ VISUALIZATION:  Selection of a limited number of modeling directions from the results of experiments. Development of specific design options for interiors for the first residences.  SECOND HALF OF APRIL AND MAY  DEVELOPERS: https://mark.space/units/  Development of the crypto economy of the MARK.SPACE platform. Launch of unit-, interior designs- and functional licenses sale, available inside the boxes of units. Completion of the development and launch of the platform’s functionality, responsible for accounting of internal payments between users’ wallets and funds, which forms the basis of the platform’s crypto economy. Stress-testing of accounting for all types of payment within the platform. Launching procedures for outputting tokens from user wallets to any external ERC-20 wallets. Completion of the development and launch of a system for controlling ownership of virtual property: units, including the purchase and sale of these virtual units.  3D DESIGN/ VISUALIZATION: : https://mark.space/items  Development of specific design options for interiors for the first residences.  JUNE  DEVELOPERS: https://mark.space/unitex/  Completion of the development and launch of the UNITEX platform for the sale, purchase and trading of virtual real estate units between MARK.SPACE users and business representatives. Completion of the development of formats for the existence of virtual real estate on the platform — buildings that can now include all boxes from several units. Running a preliminary version of the building constructor to visually demonstrate to users the meaning of the concepts of: unit, buildingand box, and their relationship within the MARK.SPACE universe. 3D DESIGN/VISALISATION:  Development of specific design options for interiors for the first residences (boxes).  JULY  DEVELOPERS:  Beginning of the development of the Portal Corecode, which is the basis for the existence of nodes and inter-server communication in the decentralized network of the MARK.SPACE platform. Launch of the development of a decentralized segmented data storage platform on the project nodes. The main task is to determine the methods of data protection when storing information on nodes owned by any person. Launch of development of web-interface in visualization format №1 for virtual reality (VR) glasses. Initiation of the development of computer interfaces, based on the Vulkan platform for working with VR helmets. As a demonstration site, HTC VIVE PROis selected because of its wireless computer connection.  3D DESIGN/VISUALIZATION:  Development of street designs with the exterior of the facades of buildings of MARK.SPACE First City.  AUGUST– SEPTEMBER  DEVELOPERS:  Continued development of the Portal Corecode. Organization of the first platforms test nodes and conducting stress testing. Preparation of a service for registering admission to Beta-testing of the first server owners who wished to include their equipment in the decentralized test network as nodes. Continued development of segmentation technology with the implementation of experiments and stress tests. Development of a special interface for the organization of the Real Estate Blockchain Expo 2018, which took place in Seoul, South Korea in mid-September. Conducting experiments with the optimization of models of 3D-objects for inclusion in the box spaces. Development of a system for reformatting object models from the 3DMax and Blender format into the project format. Launch of development of 3D models and behavioral reactions of user avatars.  3D DESIGN/VISUALIZATION:   Development of street design with the exterior of the facades of buildings in the MARK.SPACE First City. Development of a special design for the Real Estate Blockchain Expo 2018, which took place in mid-September in Seoul, Korea.

Author: lordzc
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: There are too many 3d reality projects. What are you going to do differently?

Author: mark.space
Title: [ANN][ICO] MARK.SPACE - 3D/VR ecosystem on blockchain
Body: Thank you for your question !  Currently, there are many projects that attempt to combine VR and Blockchain technologies but MARK.SPACE takes the synergy of the ideas to a whole new level.By combining the best of both and supporting the VR-platform with a crypto-economy, MARK.SPACE created a technologically advanced virtual universe, allowing for decentralized transactions and 100% transparency.  Before MARK.SPACE, creating personalized VR projects was time consuming and expensive, and only possible with the assistance of professional developers. In the framework of the MARK.SPACE universe, each person or organization is able start their own VR/3D project, without knowing even the basics of programming.  Specially designed gadgets and costly equipment like Oculus, HTC Vive, VR-helmets and the like are optional, with no need to use powerful computers or to download special Apps. The only thing required from users is one of their existing gadgets – PCs, tablets or smartphones, and an internet connection.  Moreover, all MARK.SPACE areas will have their own web address, which means users may connect them to a domain of their choice – people will be able to visit spaces directly, without even knowing they just entered a part of an entire VR-universe.  To add to the list of how different and technologically advanced MARK.SPACE is compared to other VR-projects, we have to mention the technological readiness of the platform even before the start of the ICO, which can already be experienced by visiting the demo.
